## PureComponent

[src/components/D3Graph.js:10-10][83]

## getArrowPoints

[src/components/D3Graph.js:42-55][84]

注册Drawing绘制类

### Parameters

-   `startPoint`  
-   `endPoint`  
-   `distance`   (optional, default `5`)
-   `name` **[String][85]** name值必须和绘图类的类名保持一致
-   `drawing` **[Function][86]** 绘图类

## fromDrawing

[src/components/D3Graph.js:61-64][87]

反序列化drawing

### Parameters

-   `drawingOps` **DrawingType** 

## fromActions

[src/components/D3Graph.js:92-109][88]

反序列化actions

### Parameters

-   `actions` **[Array][89]&lt;ActionType>** 

### Examples

```javascript
const actions=fromActions([{
	type:"draw",
	params:[{
		type:"LineDrawing",
		option:{
			id:"line1",
			attrs:{}
		}
	}]
},{
	type:"draw",
	params:[{
		type:"DotDrawing",
		option:{
			id:"dot1",
			attrs:{}
		}
	}]
}])
```

## Action

[src/components/D3Graph.js:122-151][90]

action基类

### Parameters

-   `type`  
-   `params`  
-   `ops`  

### type

[src/components/D3Graph.js:127-127][91]

action的类型,是一个枚举值

### params

[src/components/D3Graph.js:132-132][92]

action的参数

Type: [Array][89]

### nextInterval

[src/components/D3Graph.js:137-137][93]

playing模式执行下一步时的时间间隔,默认没有

Type: [Number][94]?

### canBreak

[src/components/D3Graph.js:142-142][95]

是否允许中断操作

Type: [boolean][96]

## InputAction

[src/components/D3Graph.js:156-169][97]

**Extends Action**

用户输入action,中断操作

### Parameters

-   `params` **[Array][89]** 
-   `ops` **[Object][98]?** 

## DrawAction

[src/components/D3Graph.js:184-188][99]

**Extends Action**

绘图action

### Parameters

-   `drawingOps`  
-   `ops`  

### Examples

```javascript
<D3Graph actions={[
	new DrawAction(new LineDrawing({id:"line1",attrs:{x1:0,y1:0,x2:100,y2:100}})),
	new DrawAction(new DotAction({id:"dot1",attrs:{cx:100,cy:100}}))
]}/>
```

## SelectAction

[src/components/D3Graph.js:200-204][100]

**Extends Action**

选择action

### Parameters

-   `shapeId`  
-   `ops`  

### Examples

```javascript
<D3Graph actions={[new SelectAction('SHAPE_ID')]}/>
```

[src/components/D3Graph.js:248-252][103]

**Extends Action**

### Parameters

### Examples


-   `vec` **[object][98]** 位移

## handlers

[src/components/D3Graph.js:355-569][106]

Toolbar的handler

Type: {setNoneHandler: DrawingToolbar.handlers.setNoneHandler, setLineDrawHandler: DrawingToolbar.handlers.setLineDrawHandler, setCircleDrawHandler: DrawingToolbar.handlers.setCircleDrawHandler, setLinkDrawHandler: DrawingToolbar.handlers.setLinkDrawHandler, setArrowLinkDrawHandler: DrawingToolbar.handlers.setArrowLinkDrawHandler, setTextCircleDrawHandler: DrawingToolbar.handlers.setTextCircleDrawHandler, setMoveHandler: DrawingToolbar.handlers.setMoveHandler}

## D3Graph

[src/components/D3Graph.js:806-1304][114]

**Extends Component**

运筹学图形D3

### Parameters

-   `props`  

### getDrawingData

[src/components/D3Graph.js:1158-1168][115]

获取图形数据

Returns **[Array][89]&lt;any>** 

**Meta**

-   **deprecated**: 请使用`getDrawingActions`代替


### getDrawingActions

[src/components/D3Graph.js:1174-1183][116]

获取所有绘图的action

Returns **[Array][89]&lt;any>** 

### clear

[src/components/D3Graph.js:1188-1193][117]

清除画布,这个方法除了会把画布上的内容清除以外还会重置内部的action状态

### propTypes

[src/components/D3Graph.js:819-856][118]

#### Properties

-   `attrs` **[object][98]** svg的属性
-   `actions` **[Array][89]** 所有的操作
-   `selectMode` **(single | multiple)** [single] - 选择模式,是多选还是单选
-   `original` **[object][98]** 坐标原点(屏幕坐标),默认值{x:0,y:0}
-   `coordinateType` **([screen][119] \| [math][120])** [screen] - 坐标系,默认值是屏幕坐标系
-   `mode` **(none | playing)** 模式,默认是:none,如果是playing,则是样式模式,会一步一步的演示绘图过程
-   `renderToolbar` **[Function][86]** 绘图的工具栏
-   `scale` **[Number][94]?** [1] - 缩放比例,默认是1(1个单位对应一个像素)
-   `interval` **[Number][94]?** [1] - action的执行时间间隔
-   `onAction` **[Function][86]?** [null] - action的回调函数,函数包含一个参数 action

## AnchorDrawing

**Extends Drawing**

## offset

[src/components/Types.js:28-28][131]

[src/components/Types.js:42-42][132]
